info.title: INNO-API :: TR innovation API and pre production for RIS-API
InnoApi
info.description:
TR Reisendeninformationen innovation API and pre production for RIS-API.

For details on INNO-API: https://ri-wiki.com/x/CrHDAw

For details on RIS-API: https://ri-wiki.com/x/q6GsBQ

Getting started:
Use code generation with openapi-generator for the language of your desire.
for Java 11: java -jar openapi-generator-cli-4.1.3.jar generate -g java -i swagger.yml --library native --api-package %TBD% --invoker-package %TBD% --model-package %TBD%

tags.name: Locations
tags.description: [DRAFT] Locations by address, position and autocomplete.

tags.name: Transports
tags.description: Vehicle sequences, positions at platform, amenities, occupancies, geo positions etc. for transports.

tags.name: Mobilities
tags.description: [DRAFT] Mobility information for ondemand and individual transports.

tags.name: Connections
tags.description: Connection information for arrivals and particular journey combinations.

tags.name: Routings
tags.description: [DRAFT] Multimodal routing, indoor routing and indoor 2 outdoor routing.

tags.name: Journeys
tags.description: Journey details like segments, arrivals and departures and matching.

tags.name: Boards Multimodal
tags.description: [DRAFT] Multimodal arrival and departure boards for public, ondemand and individual transports with walk durations depending on reference position.

tags.name: Misc
tags.description: [DRAFT] miscellaneous stuff like weather and co2 footprint that don't fit anywhere else

tags.name: Stop Places
tags.description: Information on stop places [Haltestellen] like base data, connecting times, platforms and all kind of mappings by position, name and foreign keys.

tags.name: Boards Public
tags.description: arrival and departure boards for public transports

get.description: Returns an arrival board [Ankunftstafel] for all public transports [Oeffentliche Verkehre].

parameters.name: evaNumbers
parameters.description: list of eva numbers of stations [Bahnhoefe] to get board for

parameters.name: timeStart
parameters.description: start time for board as full qualified datetime, if omitted current time will be used

parameters.name: timeEnd
parameters.description: end time for board as full qualified datetime, if omitted current time plus 30 minutes will be used

parameters.name: includeStationGroup
parameters.description: should all stations of group the passed eva numbers belong to (for instance a request to 'FFM Hoch' would also return 'FFM tief') be included

parameters.name: filterTransports
parameters.description: filter for transport types that should be returned, if ommitted all types of transport are returned

parameters.name: maxViaStops
parameters.description: limits amount of via stops per transport (limitation doesn't apply to additional and canceled stops), if ommitted all via stops are returned, if zero no via stops are returned

parameters.name: maxTransportsPerType
parameters.description: limits amount of results per transport type, if ommitted no truncation is applied

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description:
define sorting order, if omitted sorting is by TIME
- TIME (Sorting based on best known time information ie real before preview before schedule)
- TIME_SCHEDULE (Sorting based on schedule time)

parameters.name: innoSollfahrplan
parameters.description: inno: controls whether to include scheduled timetable [Sollfahrplan] or not

Cache-Control.description: Controls whether and how long response can be cached by consumers, defaults to 'no-cache, no-store'.

get.description: Returns a list of stop places [Haltestelle] matching the provided name query, optional limited to a max radius around a provided geo coordinate, ordered by relevance or name matching desc. The query has support for fuzzy searching, means minimal typos are ignored even without providing wildcards.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: query for stop place names [Haltestellenname] to search for, use * for wildcards if necessary

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: optional geo reference position longitude

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: optional geo reference position latitude

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: optional radius in meters around geo reference position to search for stop places matching query

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description:
sorting for search results, if omitted RELEVANCE will be used
- RELEVANCE (stop places are sorted by relevance descending (main stations etc. first))
- QUERY_MATCH (stop places are sorted by matching the provided query string descending aka Levensthein Distance)

parameters.name: onlyValid
parameters.description: indicates whether only valid stop places should be returned, defaults to true

parameters.name: locales
parameters.description:
languages to include, defaults to DE only
- DE (German)
- EN (English)
- FR (French)
- IT (Italian)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: limit parameter in order to limit total amount of results, defaults to 25

Cache-Control.description: Controls whether and how long response can be cached by consumers, defaults to 'no-cache, no-store'.

get.description: Returns connecting times [Umstiegszeiten] matrix for a set of stop places [Haltestellen] belonging to a particular group on a platform or optional sector level. Source for connecting times is at least the DB guideline RIL420 and in case of a digitialized station a real indoor mapping with different persona types.

parameters.name: evaNumber
parameters.description: eva number of desired stop place [Haltestelle]

parameters.name: group
parameters.description:
stop place group [Station, Stadtgebiet, Umstiegsbereich] to consider connecting times for, defaults to STATION if omitted
- STATION (group defined by station, for instance FFM = Hoch + Tief)

parameters.name: fromPlatform
parameters.description: platform to calculate times origin, if omitted all platforms are considered

parameters.name: fromSector
parameters.description: sector to calculate times origin, if omitted all sectors are considered

parameters.name: toPlatform
parameters.description: platform to calculate times destination, if omitted all platforms are considered

parameters.name: toSector
parameters.description: sector to calculate times destination, if omitted all sectors are considered

parameters.name: calculateSectors
parameters.description: should connecting times be calculated based on sector level, otherwise platform level

parameters.name: personaTypes
parameters.description: persona types that should be returned (if more than 1 is available), defaults to all personae if omitted

parameters.name: onlyRil420
parameters.description: only return RIL420 based connecting times (hence no INDOOR_ROUTING or FALLBACK), defaults to false meaning the best available connecting time source will be returned (1. INDOOR_ROUTING, 2. RIL420, 3. FALLBACK)

Cache-Control.description: Controls whether and how long response can be cached by consumers, defaults to 'no-cache, no-store'.

type of stop place keye

- STADA (statitionsdatenbank number)

parameters.name: maxTransportsPerType
parameters.description: limits amount of results per transport type, if ommitted no truncation is applied

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description:
define sorting order, if omitted sorting is by TIME
- TIME (Sorting based on best known time information ie real before preview before schedule)
- TIME_SCHEDULE (Sorting based on schedule time)

parameters.name: positionLevel
parameters.description: reference position level for calculating walk durations from, if ommitted, no walk durations are calculated

get.description: Returns a transports vehicle sequence [Wagenreihung] with optional position at platform [Positionierung am Gleis], amenities [Ausstattungsmerkmalen] and occupancy [Auslastung] for a particular departure.

parameters.name: journeyID
parameters.description: id of journey [FahrtID]

parameters.name: departureID
parameters.description: id of departure [AbfahrtID]

parameters.name: includePosition
parameters.description: include position at platform [Gleis, Bahnsteig, Plattform], if omitted or false no platform and no position information per vehicle will be returned

parameters.name: includeAmenities
parameters.description: include amenities [Ausstatungsmerkmale] like WC, WLAN, boarding aids etc. on a vehicle base, if omitted or false no amenities will be returned

parameters.name: includeOccupancy
parameters.description:
include (detailed) occupancy [Auslastung] for vehicles at departure, if omitted or NONE no occupancy will be returned
- NONE (return no occupancy)
- OVERALL (return only overall occupancy on a first / economy class level)
- DETAIL (return detailed occupancy information like free bike mounts , free seats, stance etc.)

Cache-Control.description: Controls whether and how long response can be cached by consumers, defaults to 'no-cache, no-store'.

get.description: Returns a transports vehicle sequence [Wagenreihung] with optional position at platform [Positionierung am Gleis], amenities [Ausstattungsmerkmale] and occupancy [Auslastung] for a particular departure. This is the unmatched entrypoint in case the caller is not aware of the particular journeyID and departureID.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: date (yyyy-mm-dd) of scheduled start of journey [Verkehrstag]

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: category of transport [Fahrtgattung]

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: number of transport [Fahrtnummer]

parameters.name: evaNumber
parameters.description: departure station id [Abfahrt] for desired departure

parameters.name: time
parameters.description: scheduled departure time [Geplante Abfahrtszeit] for desired departure as full qualified datetime (yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ)

parameters.name: includePosition
parameters.description: include position at platform [Gleis, Bahnsteig, Plattform], if omitted or false no platform and no position information per vehicle will be returned

parameters.name: includeAmenities
parameters.description: include amenities [Ausstatungsmerkmale] like WC, WLAN, boarding aids etc. on a vehicle base, if omitted or false no amenities will be returned

parameters.name: includeOccupancy
parameters.description:
include (detailed) occupancy [Auslastung] for vehicles at departure, if omitted or NONE no occupancy will be returned
- NONE (return no occupancy)
- OVERALL (return only overall occupancy on a first / economy class level)
- DETAIL (return detailed occupancy information like free bike mounts , free seats, stance etc.)

- OCCASIONAL_TRAVELLER (Occasional traveller [Gelegenheits-Reisender / Standard-Reisender] having mean walking speed. This is the default traveller.)

passengerChange.description: Indicates whether passengers are allowed to enter / leave [Fahrgastwechsel].

timeSchedule.description: Scheduled time [Soll] of stop as fully qualified date (for instance '2019-08-19T12:56:14+02:00' or '2019-08-19T10:56:14Z').

time.description: Best known time information of stop as fully qualified date (for instance '2019-08-19T12:56:14+02:00' or '2019-08-19T10:56:14Z').

platformSchedule.description: Scheduled platform [Gleis, Bahnsteig, Plattform] the transport arrives / departs at.

platform.description: Actual platform [Gleis, Bahnsteig, Plattform] the transport arrives / departs at.

messages.description: List of messages for journey at this stop [Freitexte].

arrivalOrDepartureID.description: ID of arrival or departure, depends on event type.

canceled.description: Indicates whether this event has been canceled.

reliefFor.description: List of transports this journey at this particular event reliefs for [Entlastungszug].

reliefBy.description: List of transports this journey at this particular event is reliefed by [Entlastungszug].

replacementFor.description: List of transports this journey at this particular event replaces [Ersatzzug].

replacedBy.description: List of transports this journey at this particular event is replaced by [Ersatzzug].

travelsWith.description: List of journeys this journey at this particular event travels with [Vereinigt Mit].

EventType.description:
Type of event. Can be arrival or departure.
- ARRIVAL (Ankunft)
- DEPARTURE (Abfahrt)

journeyCanceled.description: Flag that indicates whether whole journey has been canceled.

events.description: List of events [Fahrtereignisse]. Order is based on 1 - scheduled time and 2 - arrival before departure.

JourneyEventBased.description: Event based [Fahrtereignisbasiert] information for a particular journey [Fahrtverlauf].

JourneyType.description:
Defines whether journey [Fahrt] is regular or some kind of special.
- REGULAR (Regular scheduled journey)
- REPLACEMENT (Journey that replaces another journey)
- RELIEF (Journey that reliefs another journey)
- EXTRA (Journey that is somehow extra

label.description: Marketing - or product name of the transport, for instance 'Sprinter' or 'Schwarzwaldexpress' etc. [Marketing Name / Produkt Name].

TransportPublicDestinationOriginJourney.description: Public transport reference [Oeffentlicher Verkehr Referenz] with origin [Herkunft] and destination [Ziel] information and journey id [FahrtID].

IndoorRouting.description: Indoor routing with segments, levels and length.

type.description: Type of segment within indoor routing.

polyline.description: Polyline of leg for map drawing.
Polyline of leg for map drawing.

duration.description: Duration of trip in ISO8601 (for instance 'P3Y6M4DT12H30M17S').

distance.description: Distance for leg. May be empty.

journeyID.description: Id of journey the bus belongs to.

polyline.description: Polyline of leg for map drawing.

connectingTimes.description: List of person dependent connecting times for connect segment.

LegConnect.description: Connect leg for connects within a station / stations group.

polyline.description: Polyline of leg for map drawing.

duration.description: Duration of trip in ISO8601 (for instance 'P3Y6M4DT12H30M17S').

distance.description: Distance for leg. May be empty.

journeyID.description: Id of journey the train belongs to.

trainOrigin.description: Name of station the train departed at.

trainDestination.description: Name of station the train will arrive at.

polyline.description: Polyline of leg for map drawing.

duration.description: Duration of trip in ISO8601 (for instance 'P3Y6M4DT12H30M17S').

distance.description: Distance for leg. May be empty.

trips.description: List of trips from routing provider.

duration.description: Duration of trip in ISO8601 (for instance 'P3Y6M4DT12H30M17S').

timeTarget.description: Target (planing) time of stop as fully qualified date (for instance '2019-08-19T12:56:14+02:00' or '2019-08-19T10:56:14Z').

timeActual.description: Actual (forecast) time of stop as fully qualified date (for instance '2019-08-19T12:56:14+02:00' or '2019-08-19T10:56:14Z'). May be empty in case we don't have actual information.

timeTarget.description: Target (planing) time of stop as fully qualified date (for instance '2019-08-19T12:56:14+02:00' or '2019-08-19T10:56:14Z').

timeActual.description: Actual (forecast) time of stop as fully qualified date (for instance '2019-08-19T12:56:14+02:00' or '2019-08-19T10:56:14Z'). May be empty in case we don't have actual information.

timeTarget.description: Target (planing) time of stop as fully qualified date (for instance '2019-08-19T12:56:14+02:00' or '2019-08-19T10:56:14Z').

timeActual.description: Actual (forecast) time of stop as fully qualified date (for instance '2019-08-19T12:56:14+02:00' or '2019-08-19T10:56:14Z'). May be empty in case we don't have actual information.

arrivalCanceled.description: Indicates whether arrival has been canceled [Haltausfall].

arrivalTimeSchedule.description: Scheduled arrival time [Ankunftszeit Soll] of stop as fully qualified date (for instance '2019-08-19T12:56:14+02:00' or '2019-08-19T10:56:14Z').

arrivalTime.description: Best known arrival time information of stop as fully qualified date (for instance '2019-08-19T12:56:14+02:00' or '2019-08-19T10:56:14Z').

arrivalPlatformSchedule.description: Scheduled arrival platform [Gleis, Bahnsteig, Plattform - Plan].

arrivalPlatform.description: Estimated arrival platform [Gleis, Bahnsteig, Plattform - Vorschau].

connections.description: List of available connections [Anschluesse] with connection status [Anschlussbewertung].

ConnectionArrival.description: Connection [Anschluss] information for transport arriving at particular stop [Haltestelle].

duration.description: Duration of connect in ISO8601 (for instance 'P3Y6M4DT12H30M17S').

ConnectionSource.description:
Source of connection information.
- CALCULATED_SCHEDULE (Connection is based on scheduled information)
- CALCULATED_PREVIEW (Connection is based on preview / real information)
- DISPOSITION (Connection is based on disposition decission)

ConnectionStatus.description:
Connecting status for different personas.
- SAFE (Connection is considered as safe, enough time left)
- CRITICAL (Connection is considered as critical, only little time left)
- IMPOSSIBLE (Connection is consiered as impossible, not enough time to reach)
- UNKNOWN (Connection status is unknown)

DispositionStatus.description:
Status for disposition of connection.
- WAITING (Disposition decission is transport must wait)
- NOT_WAITING (Disposition decission is transport must not wait)
- NONE (No disposition decission)

timeSchedule.description: Scheduled time [Abfahrtszeit Soll] of stop as fully qualified date (for instance '2019-08-19T12:56:14+02:00' or '2019-08-19T10:56:14Z').

time.description: Best known time information of stop as fully qualified date (for instance '2019-08-19T12:56:14+02:00' or '2019-08-19T10:56:14Z').

platformSchedule.description: Scheduled platform [Gleis, Bahnsteig, Plattform] the transport departs at.

platform.description: Actual platform [Gleis, Bahnsteig, Plattform] the transport departs at.

messages.description: List of available messages to display for this departure.

canceled.description: Indicates whether the departure has been canceled [Haltausfall].

additional.description: Indicates whether this departure is additional [Zusatzhalt], meaning not be part of the regular schedule.

reliefFor.description: List of transports this journey reliefs for [Entlastungszug].

reliefBy.description: List of transports this journey is reliefed by [Entlastungszug].

replacementFor.description: List of transports this journey replaces [Ersatzzug].

replacedBy.description: List of transports this journey is replaced by [Ersatzzug].

travelsWith.description: List of journeys this journey travels with [Vereinigt Mit].

StopDepartureConnect.description: Departure information within departure boards [Abfahrtstafeln] with connect info [Anschlussinformation].

departureIDConnecting.description: Unique id for departure of connecting journey [AbfahrtID].

MobilityOnDemand.description: On demand mobility information like taxis, shuttles etc.

count.description: Amount of individual mobilities for pickup station, type and provider.

MobilityIndividual.description: Individual mobility information like call a bike, scooter, rental cars.

speed.description: Current speed of transport in km/h.

wifiaccesspointID.description: ID of wifi access point [MAC Adresse].

wagonIdentificationNumber.description: Wagon identification number [Wagenordnugnsnummer] of vehicle in transport.

TransportMatchWifi.description: Public transport [Oeffentlicher Verkehr] and vehicle [Fahrzeug] matching result where a wifi accesspoint is located in.

wifiaccesspointID.description: ID of wifi access point [MAC Adresse].

TransportMatchWifis.description: Public transports [Oeffentlicher Verkehr] and vehicles [Fahrzeug] matching results where a wifi accesspoint is located in.

vehicleID.description: ID of the vehicle (for rail vehicles usually the UIC identification nunmber).

Vehicle.description: General vehicle [Fahrzeug] information. If the vehicleID is empty, only the type information is available.

VehicleCategory.description:
Category of vehicle [Fahrzeug] according to basic visual differentiation.
- DOUBLEDECK_FIRST_ECONOMY_CLASS (Doppelstockwagen 1.& 2. Klasse)
- DOUBLEDECK_FIRST_CLASS (Doppelstockwagen 1. Klasse)
- DOUBLEDECK_ECONOMY_CLASS (Doppelstockwagen 2. Klasse)
- DOUBLEDECK_CONTROLCAR_FIRST_ECONOMOY_CLASS (Doppelstocksteuerwagen 1. & 2. Klasse)
- DOUBLEDECK_CONTROLCAR_FIRST_CLASS (Doppelstocksteuerwagen 1. Klasse)
- DOUBLEDECK_CONTROLCAR_ECONOMY_CLASS (Doppelstocksteuerwagen 2. Klasse)
- DOUBLEDECK_CARCARRIER_PASSENGERTRAIN (Doppelstock-Autotransportwagen der Reisezugwagen-Bauart)
- PASSENGERCARRIAGE_FIRST_ECONOMY_CLASS (Reisezugwagen 1.& 2. Klasse)
- PASSENGERCARRIAGE_FIRST_CLASS (Reisezugwagen 1.Klasse)
- PASSENGERCARRIAGE_ECONOMY_CLASS (Reisezugwagen 2.Klasse)
- CONTROLCAR_FIRST_CLASS (Steuerwagen & 1.Klasse)
- CONTROLCAR_ECONOMY_CLASS (Steuerwagen & 2.Klasse)
- CONTROLCAR_FIRST_ECONOMY_CLASS (Steuerwagen 1.& 2.Klasse)
- DININGCAR (Speisewagen)
- HALFDININGCAR_FIRST_CLASS (Halbspeisewagen & 1. Klasse)
- HALFDININGCAR_ECONOMY_CLASS (Halbspeisewagen & 2. Klasse)
- SLEEPER_FIRST_CLASS (Schlafwagen 1. Klasse)
- SLEEPER_FIRST_ECONOMY_CLASS (Schlafwagen 1. & 2. Klasse)
- SLEEPER_ECONOMY_CLASS (Schlafwagen 2. Klasse)
- COUCHETTE_FIRST_CLASS (Liegewagen 1. Klasse)
- COUCHETTE_ECONOMY_CLASS (Liegewagen 2. Klasse)
- BAGGAGECAR (Gepaeckwagen)
- LOCOMOTIVE (Lok)
- POWERCAR (Triebkopf)
- UNDEFINED (unbekannt)

constructionType.description: Class respectively (Construction) type of the vehicle [Bauart bzw. Baureihe].

hasFirstClass.description: Indicates if the vehicle has first class seats.

hasEconomyClass.description: Indicates if the vehicle has economy class seats.

layoutID.description: ID of the layout of the vehicle type.

VehicleType.description: Detailed information on the vehicle [Fahrzeug] type.

wagonIdentificationNumber.description: Wagon identification number [Wagenordnugnsnummer] of vehicle in transport.

TransportMatchVehicleID.description: Public transport [Oeffentlicher Verkehr] and vehicle [Fahrzeug] matching result for a particular vehicle id.

vehicleID.description: Unique id for vehicle (for rail vehicles usually the UIC identification nunmber).

TransportMatchVehicleIDs.description: Public transports [Oeffentlicher Verkehr] and vehicles [Fahrzeug] matching results for a particular vehicle id.

CoordinateOutdoor.description: Outdoor coordinate within geo reference system.

informationAge.description: Duration of trip in ISO8601 (for instance 'P3Y6M4DT12H30M17S').

TransportMatchGeoPosition.description: Public transport [Oeffentlicher Verkehr] matching result for a particular geo position.

TransportMatchGeoPositions.description: Public transports [Oeffentlicher Verkehr] matching results for a particular geo position.

OccupancyDetail.description:
Detail level for vehicle occupancy [Auslastung] information.
- NONE (return no occupancy)
- OVERALL (return only overall occupancy on a first / economy class level)
- DETAIL (return detailed occupancy information like free bike mounts , free seats, stance etc.)

AmenityStatus.description:
Status an amenity [Ausstattungsmerkmal] can have.
- AVAILABLE (Amenity is considered as available [Verfgbar])
- NOT_AVAILABLE (Amenity is considered as not available [Nicht Verfgbar])
- RESERVED (Amenity is considered as reserved [Reserviert])
- UNDEFINED (Status is undefined [Undefiniert])

AmenityType.description:
Type of amenity [Ausstattungsmerkmal] mostly according to VDV 454.
- BISTRO (Bordbistro)
- AIR_CONDITION (Klimaanlage)
- BIKE_SPACE (Fahrradstellplaetze)
- WHEELCHAIR_SPACE (Rollstuhlstellplaetze)
- TOILET_WHEELCHAIR (Rollstuhlgaengige Toilette)
- ZONE_MULTI_PURPOSE (Mehrzweckbereich)
- BOARDING_AID (Einstiegshilfe)
- CABIN_INFANT (Kleinkindabteil)
- ZONE_QUIET (Ruhebereich)
- ZONE_FAMILY (Familienbereich)
- INFO (Info-Abteil)
- SEATS_SEVERELY_DISABLED (Plaetze fuer Schwerbehinderte)
- SEATS_BAHN_COMFORT (Plaetze fr BahnComfort-Kunden)
- SEATS_LUFTHANSA_EXPRESS_RAIL (Plaetze fuer LH-Codeshare) ???
- WIFI (WLAN-Hotspot)

name.description: Name of the vehicle group within the sequence.

vehicles.description: Vehicles within the group ordered in direction of travel, including informations only valid within the sequence.

VehicleGroupInSequence.description: Vehicle group [Fahrzeuggruppe] within the vehicle sequence [Wagenreihung] containing at least one vehicle [Fahrzeug].

vehicleID.description: ID of the vehicle (for rail vehicles usually the UIC identification nunmber).

wagonIdentificationNumber.description: Wagon identification number [Ordnungsnummer] of the vehicle. May be empty, if no unique identification of a wagon is needed.

amenities.description: Amount and status of vehicle amenities [Ausstattungsmerkmale].

VehicleInGroup.description: Vehicle information for a vehicle [Fahrzeug] within a vehicle group [Fahrzeuggruppe] within a vehicle sequence.

VehicleOrientation.description:
Orientation of vehicle [Fahrzeug].
 - FORWARDS (Relative orientation forwards [Vorwaerts])
 - BACKWARDS (Relative orientation backwards [Rueckwaerts])
 - UNDEFINED (Undefined orientation)

start.description: Start position [Beginn Meter] at the platform given in meters in local coordinates.

end.description: End position [Ende Meter] at the platform given in meters in local coordinates.

sector.description: Sector [Sektor] the major part of the vehicle is located in. May be empty in case the platform has no sectors.

VehiclePlatformPosition.description: Position of a vehicle [Fahrzeug] at a platform [Gleis, Bahnsteig, Plattform].

departurePlatformSchedule.description: Name of the scheduled departure platform [Plattform Soll].

departurePlatform.description: Name of the estimated departure platform [Plattform Vorschau]. Note that there might be no information on the estimated departure platform (due to various reasons); in this case the attribute platform will also be empty.

groups.description: Vehicle groups [Fahrzeuggruppen] of the transport ordered in direction of travel.

VehicleSequenceDeparture.description: Vehicle sequence [Wagenreihung] for transports at a particular departure.

VehicleSequenceStatus.description:
Reflects vehicle sequence [Wagenreihung] status with respect to order of first and economy class. 
- MATCHES_SCHEDULE (The current sequence matches the scheduled order.)
- DIFFERS_FROM_SCHEDULE (The current sequence differs from the scheduled order.)
- NO_SCHEDULE (There is no scheduled sequence.)

VehicleStatus.description:
Status of vehicle [Fahrzeug] with respect to accessibility for passengers.
- OPEN  (Vehicle is open [Offen]
- CLOSED (Vehicle is closed [Geschlossen]

street.description: Street name of address the position should be retrived for.

houseNumber.description: Housenumber of address the position should be retrived for.

postalCode.description: Postalcode [Postleitzahl] of address the position should be retrived for.

city.description: City of address the position should be retrived for.

country.description: Country of address the position should be retrived for.
